plot: In this Spanish remake of the classic American tv-series "Charlie's Angels", three beautiful latina's work as private investigators for an anonymous millionaire, who they only get in contact with through David Bose.
plot_en: In this Spanish remake of the classic American tv-series "Charlie's Angels", three beautiful latina's work as private investigators for an anonymous millionaire, who they only get in contact with through David Bose.
plot_es: In this Spanish remake of the classic American tv-series "Charlie's Angels", three beautiful latina's work as private investigators for an anonymous millionaire, who they only get in contact with through David Bose.
title: Ángeles
